name: Collective Wisdom
tag_list: pets, dogs, cats, birds, fish, social-networking, rating, directory, online-community
overview:
Collective Wisdom creates websites which combine consumer ratings with social communities.

In 2001, our first site, RemedyFind.com, allowed individuals to rate the health treatments they have used for chronic health conditions. The site had a community of over 100,000 members when it was acquired by RevolutionHealth.com in 2006.

Our current site, RightPet.com allows pet owners to rate the breeds/species of pets they have owned, as well as the pet businesses/services they’ve used. The site includes a comprehensive list of dogs, cats, birds and fish, as well as geographically sorted pet businesses such as rescue groups, breeders, trainers, and boarding facilities.
